alert.note: Alert for Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 1:33PM CST until December 10 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Higher terrain of Iron County. * WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest wind gusts of 25 to 30 mph may cause areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
